Posts.Content: After undergoing a double mastectomy for breast cancer with lymph node involvement, and surviving AC and Taxol treatments, you can bet that I am "Living it up" to the fullest. Housework and other responsibilities don't always fit into my daily schedule when there are more enjoyable things to do. I'm not sure how many months after chemo before a person wants to settle down and "stop playing." I'm not at that point yet.
Posts.Title: Let's live it up
